name: Pepe Silvia Meme Template
description: Pepe Silvia is a reference to one of the most famous scenes of It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia in which the character Charlie goes on a conspiratorial rant about how he believes a person named "Pepe Silvia" does not exist. The scene has gone on to be a favorite in the Always Sunny fandom and has found use as a reaction image on Twitter.
